name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Full Stack Developer with 8 years of experience, I possess strong skills in **gRPC**, **RESTful APIs**, **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, **Neo4j**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** practices. I excel at building high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing modern **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies. My proficiency in full-stack development is bolstered by expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. 
I have a solid background in clean coding, automation practices, data structures, and algorithms, necessary for developing robust applications. Additionally, I have extensive cloud knowledge with **Azure** and **AWS**, and have successfully led enterprise-grade platform development that integrates AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing. 
With experience in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I prioritize compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I am also skilled in building machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
